name: AP_CLAIM_CDEDIT_HX
description: The AP_CLAIM_CODEEDIT_HX table contains the code edit history of an accounts payable claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count of the change on the claim.

columns.name: EDIT_DATE
columns.description: The date that code editor was run on the claim.

columns.name: EDITOR_CLAIM_NUM
columns.description: The ID of the claim sent to the code editor.

columns.name: EDIT_RESULT_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the result of the code edit.

columns.name: RESPONSE_SUMMARY
columns.description: The response summary of the code edit.

columns.name: RESPONSE_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the response note for the code edit.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user doing the code edit.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: EDIT_DATETIME
columns.description: The code edit date and time.
